description:
template/parse: rename Set to Parse
Preamble to the simplification of the template API.
Although the signature of Parse (nee Set) changes,
it's really an internal function, used only by
text/template.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

FYI

http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go
File src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go#newcode18
src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go:18: Name string    // Name is the name of the template represented by the tree.
just: Name of the template ... ?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go#newcode19
src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go:19: Root *ListNode // Root is the top-level root of the tree.
Just: Top-level root of the tree. ?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/set.go
File src/pkg/text/template/set.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/set.go#newcode107
src/pkg/text/template/set.go:107: // TODO: "ROOT" is just a placeholder while we rejig the API.
re-jig

On Nov 18, 2011, at 12:32 PM, gri@golang.org wrote:

> FYI
> 
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go
> File src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go (right):
>

> src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go:18: Name string    // Name is the
> name of the template represented by the tree.
> just: Name of the template ... ?
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go#newcode19
> src/pkg/text/template/parse/parse.go:19: Root *ListNode // Root is the
> top-level root of the tree.
> Just: Top-level root of the tree. ?
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/set.go
> File src/pkg/text/template/set.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5415052/diff/1/src/pkg/text/template/set.go#newcode107
> src/pkg/text/template/set.go:107: // TODO: "ROOT" is just a placeholder
> while we rejig the API.
> re-jig


the word is 'rejig'.

-rob
